participant_1.background:
I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
I ride my scooter down the boardwalk until the wind blows away my worries.
I tried my hand at gambling, but I didn't have the stomach for it.
I paint my nails in different colors to match my outfits.

participant_2.background:
I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.
i am a youtube.
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
My day is going great! Thanks for asking! How is yours?
It is going well! I am just relaxing on the beach.
That sounds really nice! I wish I could be there.
You should come visit! The weather is perfect.
I would love to but I am currently on a hunting trip with my family.
Oh that is fun! I have never been hunting before.
It is really fun! You should try it sometime.
I might have to! I am always looking for new experiences.
That is great! I am glad to hear that.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play with my pet parrot, Todd. He is a very friendly bird.
That sounds adorable! I love animals.
I am glad! I am a big animal lover myself.
I used to have a pet dog, but he passed away a few years ago.
I am so sorry to hear that! I know how hard it can be to lose a pet.
It was very hard, but I am happy that I had him in my life.
